title: White House Office of Energy and Climate Change Policy
deleted: We are a Refugee Community in Ethiopia - our lives are also important-help us. We don't have our own office or website - we only have access to the global Internet. People help us. We really need funds for food, water, clothing, housing, medicines and protection against coronavirus.This is a post of despair - no one helps us. There is a war in Ethiopia and we have to leave our country.We are very asking-who can help.At the bottom of our bitcoin account for donations.
